answerText: going over Niagara Falls in a barrel [or going over Horseshoe Falls] [10] Niagara Falls is on the border between Canada and this state.
heading: NASAT  |2014 | 8 | 16 | Geography | None | College
subject: Geography
question: Question: Karel Soucek successfully did this in 1984, but was later killed while trying to recreate it at the Houston Astrodome. For 10 points each:  [10] Name this action first done in 1901 by Michigan schoolteacher Annie Taylor as a publicity stunt. Fourteen other people have intentionally done this, despite its illegality, with several drowning in the process.
